Set of functions to make SmRG routines work properly
(so we don’t have to reinvent the wheel! [citation needed]).

for more details please visit: 

https://it.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/48219-spherical-hough-transform-for-3d-images
http://nicprice.net/diptest/
https://github.com/mscipio/MATLABtools___nbin_mu
